files.patch:
@@ -344,3 +344,3 @@
-    Whether or not a Lint category is specified using one of its aliases immaterial.\n\
-    For example, "-Xlint:identity -Werror:synchronization" will cause warnings in the\n\
-    "identity" lint category to terminate compilation.
+    Lint categories and their aliases can be used interchangeably. For example,\n\
+    the flags "-Xlint:identity" and "-Werror:synchronization" will properly\n\
+    cause warnings in the "identity" lint category to terminate compilation.
